tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP It)) (VP (VBZ 's) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ human) (NN right)) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VP (VB be) (ADJP (JJ happy))) (, ,) (ADVP (RB never)) (VP (VB settle) (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (JJR less)) (SBAR (IN than) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP deserv))))))))))))))
